page.title: 13LIVING IN DARTFORD
page.content: These are childrens views of Dartford. The pleasures of Dartford are that it has a big swimming pool, quite a lot of parks and a very big library. There is also a Saturday market. The main problem of Dartford is the traffic that is very dangerous. Dartford is very untidy and there are too many pubs around. Shops are closing down and others opening all the time. There are many shops in Dartford such as Sainsburys, Bejams, Co-op to name but a few. There are also quite a few shoe shops like Manfield, Curtess and True-Forms. The quality of the shops is quite good, but the town could be improved by having a few more fashion shops. The indoor centre is very good and at Christmas they have lots of decorations. They have a few seats where people can meet. There is an outdoor market on Thursday & Saturday.
